ca.mymenuapp.ui.widgets

Class ForegroundImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • ca.mymenuapp.ui.widgets.ForegroundImageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class ForegroundImageView
extends android.widget.ImageView
    An ImageView that is able to display selector drawables as it's foreground.
